title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, September 21, 1862
summary: Hotchkiss relates the battle of Sharpsburg (at Antietam Creek), and gives his thoughts on his daughter's education.
keywords: Battle Description, Military Authority, Death/Casualties, Prisons/Prisoners, Troop Movement, Desertion/Leave, Women, Home Front, Slavery, African Americans, American Civil War
